data.name: E-GIRL Next Door: OnlyFap Beginnings
data.detailed_description:
E-GIRL Next Door: OnlyFap Beginnings is an exciting visual novel about the girl next door and her online journey into the world of adult content creation.

You've just moved in next door to a beautiful girl who seems to have it all together. Little do you know, she's just getting started in the world of online adult content creation. Help her out on her journey and see what this exciting adventure has to offer. There's plenty of ups and downs, but with your help, she just might make it to the top.

Neither of you know how this adventure will turn out, but one thing is for sure... It's going to be one hell of a ride.

Features:

-An intriguing and original story
-Choice-driven gameplay that lets you shape the story
-NSFW content and scenes throughout the game
-A cast of interesting and fleshed-out characters

Sometimes life leads you down an unexpected path. Growing up in a small town, you never imagined you'd end up living next door to an internet celebrity. But that's exactly what happened when you moved in next to the e-girl next door.

You quickly learned that she was far from the perfect angel she seemed to be online. In fact, she was just a regular girl who was trying to make her way in the world. And she just so happened to be embarking on a journey into the world of online adult content creation.

You've been drawn into her world and you're not quite sure how to get out. But that's okay, because this is shaping up to be one hell of an adventure.

Gameplay:

E-GIRL Next Door: OnlyFap Beginnings is a classic interactive visual novel with branching paths. Explore through the story and make choices that affect gameplay and lead to different endings! Choices are meaningful and there is plenty room for exploration.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity.
